projects.name: CleverBridge
projects.description: Air National Guard active duty base consisting of 1,100 members across the base
achievements: Responsible for the management of quality assurance and system efficiency functions of assigned RDBMS systems by enforcing the prescribed RDBMS

Provides Information Assurance systems support for all disciplines, ensuring the rigorous application of information security/information assurance policies, principles, and practices in the delivery of network services

Optimizes the functionality and performance of hardware and software systems and ensures availability, integrity, efficiency, and reliability of system/functional resources while managing the communications focal point coordination and workload distribution duties. Analyzes, manages, and directs installation of any new hardware or software introduced into the environment to ensure its compatibility with existing architecture, its reliability, and functionality in relation to the organization's business requirements
Created an in-depth Task Tracker saving roughly 6 man-hours per week; $10,000 a year.
Ensures resolution of DBMS inconsistencies across the installation in coordination with other information technology specialists and systems administers
Provides ongoing technical support to customers to ensure proper functional use of equipment and programs and to preclude undue interruptions to IT and communications services.
Installs, maintains, and repairs hardware devices supporting a broad range of information and communications systems

Serves as a central point of contact, placing over 100 communication tickets and fixing over 100 communication-related issues, saving $8,000 for the DoD by eliminating the need for customers to need further communication support
Appointed equipment custodian for 2 years and have acquired new monitors and laptops for 60 members.
Expertly supports and maintains $50,000 worth of computer equipment, saving the government Information Technology team 50 man-hours.

projects.name: Herofi
projects.description: Formerly known as Teklinks, an MSP company supporting over 50 businesses across Tennessee.
achievements: Responsible for managing the IT infrastructure and client satisfaction levels for 50+ businesses throughout Middle Tennessee
Improved and problem solved various networking problems, server problems, and cloud-based programs
Provided on-going optimization and problem solving support, continually surveys system operation to identify potential systems problems which could lead to loss or serious interruption of service
Gave excellent customer support and diligently stayed on call 24/7
Sat in multiple interviews and assisted in the hiring process
Was proactive based on an understanding of the business, not just tech. requirements

recommendations.name: Jordan Fernandes
recommendations.jobTitle: IT Operations Manager at The Surgical Clinic
recommendations.text: I thoroughly enjoyed my time working with Patrick, and came to know him as a truly valuable asset to absolutely any team. His knowledge of IT support and expertise in working with end users was a huge advantage to our entire office. Along with his undeniable talent, Patrick has always been an absolute joy to work with. He is a true team player, and always manages to foster positive discussions and bring the best out of other employees. Without a doubt, I confidently recommend Patrick. As a dedicated and knowledgeable employee and an all-around great person, I know that he will be a fantastic addition to any organization.
